root.message: The STAT_CONC_DEF field for indicator 3-2-1, translated into en
root.data:
An HIV-infected person is a person found to be infected with human immunodeficiency virus by health authorities.

Number of new HIV infections detected annually per thousand HIV-uninfected people is a measure of a population's level of new HIV infection, defined as the number of newly discovered HIV infections per thousand uninfected in a population. determined time.
